thig5.3:1.2: I was afflicted with lust with sensual pleasures.
thig5.3:1.3: In the past I was restless,
thig5.3:1.4: had no power over the mind.
thig5.3:2.2: following the mark of the pleasant.
thig5.3:2.3: I did not attain tranquility of mind,
thig5.3:2.4: being under the domain of the craving mind.
thig5.3:3.3: Afflicted, not at day, not at night,
